constraints.name: interval_sum_modulo
constraints.description: 区间和模 p 的值必须与预期值相同

constraints.name: fibonacci_sequence_check
constraints.description: 区间内的元素是否满足斐波那契数列的性质，即每个元素等于前 k 个元素之和模 p
constraints.formal: forall i in [l+f, r], A[x][i] ≡ sum(A[x][i-j] for j in 1..f) (mod p)

constraints.name: interval_addition
constraints.description: 区间内所有元素加上一个常数 k
constraints.formal: forall i in [l, r], A[x][i] ← A[x][i] + k

constraints.name: interval_swap
constraints.description: 两个序列在指定区间内的元素进行交换
constraints.formal: forall i in [l, r], swap(A[x][i], A[y][i])
